```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)
library(formattable)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r BRT data}
# Table 1 - BRT data for each city - combined statistics in csv file
brt_data <- read_delim("~/Desktop/brt_air_quality/brt_data.csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
formattable(brt_data)
```

```{r pollutant data, Table 2}
# Number of recorded pollutants at different stations in the four cities from 1995-2016
library(readr)
use_pollutants <- read_delim("use_pollutants.csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
pollutant_data <- as_tibble(use_pollutants)
View(pollutant_data)
clean_pollution_data <- pollutant_data[complete.cases(pollutant_data),]
formattable(clean_pollution_data)
```

```{r Table 3}
# Belo Horizonte pollutants, 2015

closer_bh_pollutants_2015 <- read_delim("~/Desktop/brt_air_quality/BH_2015_pollutants_csv/Estação Centro Av Contorno-Table 1.csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE,)
bh_poll_tibble <- as_data_frame(closer_bh_pollutants_2015)
View(bh_poll_tibble)

figure_1 <- ggplot(bh_poll_tibble, aes(x=`Data de Medição`, y=`Refinaria Gabriel Passos`)) + 
  geom_boxplot(outlier.colour="red", outlier.shape=8,
                outlier.size=4)
View(figure_1)



  
```
